attributes.action: Require defibrillator in all large public areas
attributes.additional_details: I want Government or Parliament to do this as it would obviously benefit the health of the victim and for most serios illnesses the earlier the btter. It could take time for the ambulance to come and it would be common sense for first aid kits and defibrillators to be installed giving the victim a higher chance of survival. I specified "large public areas" because there is a higher density of people risking more people to fall victim to illness
attributes.background: I want Government or parliament to require all large public areas to require defibrillator and better with first aid kits

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We are not sure how you are defining 'large public areas' where you would like this to apply to.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
